name: agent-browser
description: Headless browser automation CLI for AI agents

scripts.build:native: bun version:sync && cargo build --release --manifest-path cli/Cargo.toml && bun scripts/copy-native.js
scripts.build:linux: bun version:sync && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml run --rm build-linux
scripts.build:macos: bun version:sync && (cargo build --release --manifest-path cli/Cargo.toml --target aarch64-apple-darwin & cargo build --release --manifest-path cli/Cargo.toml --target x86_64-apple-darwin & wait) && cp cli/target/aarch64-apple-darwin/release/agent-browser bin/agent-browser-darwin-arm64 && cp cli/target/x86_64-apple-darwin/release/agent-browser bin/agent-browser-darwin-x64
scripts.build:windows: bun version:sync && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml run --rm build-windows
scripts.build:all-platforms: bun version:sync && (bun build:linux & bun build:windows & wait) && bun build:macos
scripts.release: bun version:sync && bun build && bun build:all-platforms && bun publish
scripts.ci:version: changeset version && bun version:sync && bun install --no-frozen-lockfile
scripts.ci:publish: bun version:sync && bun run build && changeset publish
